commit.message:
Merge #3425

3425: Fix a bug for single dollar sign macro r=matklad a=edwin0cheng

This PR fixed a bug to allow the following valid `macro_rules!` :

```rust
macro_rules! m {
    ($) => ($)
}
```

Co-authored-by: Edwin Cheng <edwin0cheng@gmail.com>

Merge #3425

3425: Fix a bug for single dollar sign macro r=matklad a=edwin0cheng

This PR fixed a bug to allow the following valid `macro_rules!` :

```rust
macro_rules! m {
    ($) => ($)
}
```

Co-authored-by: Edwin Cheng <edwin0cheng@gmail.com>
